review:
I recently had a hair treatment from Dr. Richa Lakhotia, and I must say that my experience with her was truly outstanding. Dr. Richa is the epitome of professionalism. 

What sets Dr. Richa apart is not just her expertise but also her friendly *** ************* ********* She takes the time to genuinely understand the concerns of her patients and suggests treatments that are not only appropriate but also yield remarkable results. Her diagnosis was spot on, and I could sense her genuine commitment to improving my condition.

Dr. Richa's communication skills are top-notch. She explains procedures in a clear and understandable manner, making sure that I was well-informed every step of the way. This level of transparency and care significantly contributed to my overall comfort during the treatment process.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Richa Lakhotia to anyone seeking medical care in her field. Her combination of professionalism, friendliness, and expertise makes her a wonderful doctor. I am so impressed with her that I plan to refer all my friends and family members to her. Thank you, Dr. Richa, for your exceptional care and results!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Richa was so so patient with all my queries and suggested me the best treatment options which I was able to understand and finally her treatment was also top notch... she has a very gentle approach and even though I was scared.. I felt very calm while getting the treatment. Awesome she is.!

She is a very pleasant and nice doctor, her hands are so gentle... I didn't even feel the injection and she did the treatment painlessly... i would ðŸ’¯ recommend her to everyone. She fixed my tooth and gave me a lot of tips about maintaining my teeth. 
Very very sweet doctor
She is humble , careing and attend her patients with much attentiveness as well as posses higher degree of professionalism..Highly Recommended

Very good service, with very good experience. My biggest problem is solved thank you Dr Richa for helping me with my teeth!! 
I would love to recommend everyone to visit Dr richa for dental issues

She's very pleasant and quite friendly, went the extra mile to make me feel comfortable about my teeth and addressed  the cause to why it happened and suggested a few lifestyle changes. She did not just stop at fixing the issue at hand  but also patiently explained and recommended what I should be doing to keep them healthy and for longevity. I'm sure everyone will love her!
Dr richa is extremely professional and good in her treatments. She is very kind and listens to the need of the patient and explains everything in detail.

She is amazing with her work and very very kind to all her patients.. 
I had a painless experience with her.
